1\ Do\ you\ use\ earplugs\,\ ear\ protectors\ or\ headphones\ to\ reduce;
your\ perception\ of\ sound?\ (Do\ not\ consider\ protection\ used;
in\ abnormally\ loud\ environments);
\ ; 
\ ;
2\ Do\ you\ have\ difficulty\ ignoring\ ambient\ sounds\ in\ everyday;
situations?;
\ ;
\ ;
\ ;
3\ Do\ you\ find\ it\ hard\ to\ read\ in\ a\ noisy\ or\ sound-rich;
environment?;
\ ;
\ ;
\ ;
4\ Do\ you\ have\ trouble\ concentrating\ in\ noisy\ environments?;
\ ;
\ ;
\ ;
\ ;
5\ Do\ you\ struggle\ to\ hear\ a\ conversation\ in\ a\ noisy\ setting?;
\ ;
\ ;
6\ Have\ people\ around\ you\ ever\ commented\ that\ you\ are\ sensitive;
to\ noise\ or\ certain\ sounds?;
\ ;
\ ;
\ ;
7\ Are\ you\ particularly\ disturbed\ or\ annoyed\ by\ street\ noise?;
\ ;
\ ;
8\ Is\ noise\ in\ certain\ social\ situations\ (nightclubs\,\ bars\,;
concerts\,\ fireworks\,\ cocktail\ parties...)\ unpleasant\ for;
you?;
\ ;
\ ;
9\ When\ invited\ to\ an\ activity\ (cinema\,\ concert...)\,\ do\ you;
immediately\ think\ about\ the\ noise\ you\ might\ have\ to\ endure?;
\ ;
\ ;
\ ;
10\ Do\ you\ sometimes\ decline\ invitations\ or\ outings\ for\ fear\ of;
noise?;
\ ;
11\ Does\ a\ specific\ sound\ bother\ you\ more\ in\ a\ silent;
environment\ than\ in\ a\ slightly\ noisy\ room?;
\ ;
\ ;
\ ;
12\ Is\ your\ ability\ to\ concentrate\ in\ noise\ reduced\ by\ stress;
or\ fatigue?;
\ ;
\ ;
13\ Is\ your\ ability\ to\ concentrate\ in\ noise\ reduced\ at\ the\ end;
of\ the\ day?;
\ ;
\ ;
\ ;
14\ Do\ noise\ or\ certain\ sounds\ stress\ you\ out\ or\ make\ you;
angry?;
